dataComment.description: This is an export of your Funding Scotland account data. In the stored data, funds are only referenced by their unique ID. You can use the `fundLookup` field included in this export to find details on any fund currently stored within our system.
This is all the information stored about you for the purposes of authentication and other information you have chosen to save such as shortlisted funds, saved searches, and notes.

providerData.dataComment: Each account can be linked to one or more authentication provider (email/password, Google, Facebook, Twitter), this is the information we store in relation to each authentication provider.
